title: Im moving from Japan to Australia. I wonder what your league community is.
body:
Hi, I just happen to have earned a job in your place and since I really love playing league. I want to ask what is the OCE server is like.
Can you give me info about the que times, ranked environment and population?

replies.body: I got a 37 min queue for ranked the other day...

Glad to hear from yu guys.
I will see you people on the rift! If you see a japanese syndra main it wil be me

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-23T01:18:52.526+0000)
>
> Hey everyone,
> 
> We're now at a point where we can expand Ranked Summoner's Rift. The next step for this will be opening the queue up to 24 hours on a trial basis. It's important to remember that this is a trial and is not a guarantee it will always remain this way.
> 
> **On all the time:**
> 
> Summoner's Rift 5v5 Normal Blind Pick
> Summoner's Rift 5v5 Ranked Draft Pick
> ARAM
> Co-op vs AI Summoner's Rift (intro/beginner/intermediate)
> 
> **Twisted Treeline:**
> 
> Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> If you have any questions about any of this please post them below!

Keep in mind this is a trial period. Usually ranked is off from around 12-8am and I'm pretty sure 3v3 was only 2 days a week
Interesting!  Might pop on for some early morning ranked!
Don't, you will get stuck with the same shitty team 3-4 times in a row.

Lots and lots of trolls/toxic players.

Queue is about 2minutes for bronze-plat.
Ranked has trolls from Bronze-diamond.
Population, kind of low, we only have Twist Treeline thurs-sunday afternoon-nights. Never have a queue for Dominion

> [{quoted}](name=Keyblade,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=w9yrBvF9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-27T22:45:41.761+0000)
>
> Ranked has trolls from Bronze-diamond.

And Master and Challenger.

The community is disgusting.
The Kangaroos normally hop online at early hours in the morning, avoid them or they'll roo-in your promos
We got a lot of smart mouth people here and a lot of Non-Australian playing late night till early morning
well it is oce server not australian server theres bound to be some kiwis and surrounding areas here at times...

first off when you do come to australia you will be realizing that no one will be saying earned a job, getting a job here isn't seen as a reward like it might be in japan, anyway have fun with oce ranked

Normal que time ~ 1:30 minutes

Ranked 4 minutes + dodges

very toxic in the sence that its all a joke.

such as "Sup my Ni..a"
